org.forgerock.openam.radius.server.config

Class RadiusServiceConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.radius.server.config.RadiusServiceConfig

  • public class RadiusServiceConfig
extends Object
    Holds the suite of configuration from the admin console for rapid determination of whether packets should be dropped or accepted and processed.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RadiusServiceConfig(boolean isEnabled, int port, ThreadPoolConfig poolCfg, ClientConfig... clientConfigs)
      Instance created from loading handlerConfig from openAM's admin console constructs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ClientConfig findClient(String ipAddress)
      Returns the defined client for the given IP address or null if not client for that IP address is defined.
      int getPort()
      The port to which the RADIUS service should have a bound Datagram Channel listening for incoming packets if isEnabled() returns true.
      ThreadPoolConfig getThreadPoolConfig()
      Get the thread pool configuration values.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Returns true if the RADIUS service should have an open UDP Datagram Channel listening for incoming packets.
      String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RadiusServiceConfig

        public RadiusServiceConfig(boolean isEnabled,
                           int port,
                           ThreadPoolConfig poolCfg,
                           ClientConfig... clientConfigs)
        Instance created from loading handlerConfig from openAM's admin console constructs.
        Parameters:
        isEnabled - - The RADIUS Server will only open a port and listen for requests when enabled.
        port - - The UDP port on which each OpenAM server will listen for RADIUS Access-Request packets
        poolCfg - - the configuration for the thread pool to be used by the RADIUS server service.
        clientConfigs - - a number of ClientConfig objects, one for each client that will be connecting to the radius server.

    • Method Detail

      • getThreadPoolConfig

        public ThreadPoolConfig getThreadPoolConfig()
        Get the thread pool configuration values.
        Returns:
        the configuration for the thread pool.

      • findClient

        public ClientConfig findClient(String ipAddress)
        Returns the defined client for the given IP address or null if not client for that IP address is defined.
        Parameters:
        ipAddress - the ipAddress of the client to be found.
        Returns:
        the ClientConfig that has the ipAddress passed to ipAddress or null if no client has that ipAddress.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns true if the RADIUS service should have an open UDP Datagram Channel listening for incoming packets. Returns false if the RADIUS service should NOT be listening for and accepting packets.
        Returns:
        true if the RADIUS server is enabled, false if not.

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        The port to which the RADIUS service should have a bound Datagram Channel listening for incoming packets if isEnabled() returns true.
        Returns:
        the port that the RADIUS server service should listen for Datagrams on.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
